Hi everybody!

I'm trying to use the Deduplicator for Heritrix-3.1.0. So fa=
r it works, but I wanted to give the matching method "content digest" a try=
.

The index I build is based on both content and URL, so it should be no p=
roblem.

For my first try I used 


<!-- DeDuplicator module defined -->
=
=A0<bean id=3D"deduplicator" class=3D"is.landsbokasafn.deduplicator.DeDupli=
cator">
=A0 <property name=3D"indexLocation" value=3D"[see override above]"=
 />
=A0 <property name=3D"matchingMethod" value=3D"By content digest" />
=
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"jumpTo" value=3D"disposition" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <p=
roperty name=3D"origin" value=3D"" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"tryEqu=
ivalent" value=3D"false" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"mimeFilter" valu=
e=3D"^text/.*" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"blacklist" value=3D"true" =
/> -->
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"analyzeTimestamp" value=3D"false" /> -->
=
=A0 <!-- <property name=3D"changeContentSize" value=3D"false" /> -->
=A0 <!=
-- <property name=3D"statsPerHost" value=3D"false" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <propert=
y name=3D"useSparseRengeFilter" value=3D"false" /> -->
=A0 <!-- <property n=
ame=3D"originHandling" value=3D"NONE" /> -->
=A0</bean>
=A0
and it worked j=
ust fine.

But when I activate the property "matching Method" (i.e. undo th=
e uncommenting) it throws an exception - no matter what I give as a value (=
URL or digest).
The exceptions says:

2013-06-11T16:46:23.330Z SEVERE Faile=
d to convert property value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 
'i=
s.landsbokasafn.deduplicator.MatchingMethod' for property 
'matchingMethod'=
; nested exception is java.lang.IllegalStateException: 
Cannot convert valu=
e of type [java.lang.String] to required type 
[is.landsbokasafn.deduplicat=
or.MatchingMethod] for property 
'matchingMethod': no matching editors or c=
onversion strategy found; 
Can't create bean 'deduplicator'; Can't create b=
ean 'fetchProcessors'; ; Can't create bean 'crawlController'; ; Can't creat=
e bean 'frontier'; ; 
Can't create bean 'seeds'

Now I wonder what I do wro=
ng.

Maybe somebody could give me a hint?

Thanks in advance,

Steph
